title: Fabrication of silica/calcium alginate nanocomposite based on rice husk ash for efficient adsorption of phenol from water
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24322-24334
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04070H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Manal A. Khoj
The current work discusses the synthesis of three different solid adsorbents: silica nanoparticles derived from rice husk (RS), calcium alginate beads (AG), and silica/alginate nanocomposite (RSG).
